title: [html5] scroller height can't update

comments.body:
List have the same bug.
```html
<template>
  <list id='scroller'>
    <cell repeat='{{image in images}}'>
      <image src='{{image}}' style='height: 500; width: 750;' onload='onload'></image>
    </cell>
  </list>
</template>
```

body:
Scroller height is not correct after setting image height dynamically on browser.

|  | version |
| --- | --- |
| branch | `dev` |
| html5 sdk | `latest` |
| browser | Chrome/55.0.2883.87 |

Demo:
```html
<template>
  <scroller>
    <image repeat='{{image in images}}' src='{{image}}' style='height: 500; width: 750;' onload='onload'></image>
  </scroller>
</template>

<script>
  module.exports = {
    data: {
      images: [
        "http://pic.toomao.com/9e22cda150aa6af1353e7de4b565386d85e064ec",
        "http://pic.toomao.com/9e22cda150aa6af1353e7de4b565386d85e064ec",
        "http://pic.toomao.com/9e22cda150aa6af1353e7de4b565386d85e064ec",
        "http://pic.toomao.com/9e22cda150aa6af1353e7de4b565386d85e064ec",
        "http://pic.toomao.com/9e22cda150aa6af1353e7de4b565386d85e064ec",
        "http://pic.toomao.com/9e22cda150aa6af1353e7de4b565386d85e064ec",
        "http://pic.toomao.com/9e22cda150aa6af1353e7de4b565386d85e064ec",
        "http://pic.toomao.com/9e22cda150aa6af1353e7de4b565386d85e064ec"
      ]
    },
    methods: {
      onload: function(e) {
        var height = 750 / e.naturalWidth * e.naturalHeight;
        console.log(`h:${height}`)
        e.target.setStyle('height', height)
      }
    }
  }
</script>
```
